#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	char a[4][4];
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<4;++i)
	{
		for(j=0;j<4;++j)
		{
			scanf(" %c",&a[i][j]);
		}
	
	}
	int f;
	f=0;
	int ct1,ct2;
	ct1=ct2=0;
	for(i=0;i<=2;++i)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=2;++j)
		{
		  if(a[i][j]=='a')	
		  ct1++;
		  else
		  ct2++;
		  if(a[i][j+1]=='a')
		  ct1++;
		  else
		  ct2++;
		  if(a[i+1][j+1]=='a')
		  ct1++;
		  else
		  ct2++;
		  if(a[i+1][j]=='a')
		  ct1++;
		  else
		  ct2++;
		  if(ct1<2||ct2<2)
		  f=1;
		  ct1=0;ct2=0;
		}
	}
	if(f)
    cout<<"POSSIBLE\n";
    else
    cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE\n";
	return 0;
}
